content.description:
Sic dea summissosummissus, -a, -um, adj.: lowered contra SaturniaSaturnia, -ae, f.: Juno (the daughter of Saturn) vultu: 
“Ista quidem quia nota mihi tua, magne, voluntasvoluntas, -atis, f.: desire, 
Iuppiter, et Turnum et terras invita reliqui.”
content.question: According to lines 2-3 (Ista...reliqui), why has Juno abandoned Turnus?

choices.label: Jupiter has asked her to do so.

content.answer: Jupiter has asked her to do so.

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12
